<ncms-object id="" bif-version="4.0">
	<view type="" viewtype="">
		<data>
			<entities>
				<entity id="" name="" populate="">
					<fields>
						<field name="" originator=""/>
					</fields>
				</entity>
			</entities>
			<lists>
				<list id="" name="" populate="">
					<fields>
						<field name="" originator=""/>
					</fields>
				</list>
			</lists>
		</data>
		<operations>
			<operation id="" type="">
				<config>
					<parameters>
						<parameter name="">						
						</parameter>
					</parameters>
					<arguments>
						<argument binding=""/>
					</arguments>
				</config>
			</operation>
		</operations>
		<layout>
			<events>
				<event name="">
					<action id="" type="">
						<config>
							<operation-reference/>
						</config>
					</action>
				</event>
			</events>
			<containers>
				<container id="" type="" next-focus-id="">
					<config>
						<alignment>
							<control id="" align="" />
						</alignment>
					</config>
					<controls>
						<control id="" type="">
							<config>							
							</config>
						</control>
					</controls>
				</container>
			</containers>
		</layout>
		<config />
	</view>
	<bif-object-summary>
		<![CDATA[]]>
	</bif-object-summary>
	<bif-object-description>
		<![CDATA[]]>
	</bif-object-description>
</ncms-object>
Create base bxml template.description: Snippet to create base bxml template
